## Load `sgains` processed sample `CJA3183` from `nyu003`

```{r}
filename <- file.path(getwd(), "../..", "sgains/data/example", "nyu003", "nyu003_R50_20k/varbin", "CJA3183varbin.20k.txt")

head(CJA3183_sgains)
```
